verses.verse: These be the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in the <S%H6160>plain<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H5489>Red<s%> sea, between <S%H6290>Paran<s%>, and <S%H8603>Tophel<s%>, and <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, and <S%H2698>Hazeroth<s%>, and <S%H1774>Dizahab<s%>. the Red: or, Zuph
( There are <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> journey from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> unto <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea<s%>.)

And it came to pass in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, according unto all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had given him in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> unto them;

<S%H310>After<s%> he had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H6252>Astaroth<s%> in <S%H154>Edrei<s%>:
On this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H2974>began<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H874>declare<s%> this <S%H8451>law<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto us in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye have <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> long <S%H7227>enough<s%> in this <S%H2022>mount<s%>:

<S%H6437>Turn<s%> you, and take your <S%H5265>journey<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and unto all the places <S%H7934>nigh<s%> thereunto, in the <S%H6160>plain<s%>, in the <S%H2022>hills<s%>, and in the <S%H8219>vale<s%>, and in the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>side<s%>, to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and unto <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>. all: Heb. all his neighbours

<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them and to their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them. set: Heb. given
And I <S%H559>spake<s%> unto you at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> you myself <S%H905>alone<s%>:
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> you, and, behold, ye are this <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

(The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> make you a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> so many more <S%H3254>as<s%> ye are, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, as he hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> you!)
<S%H349>How<s%> can I myself alone <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2960>cumbrance<s%>, and your <S%H4853>burden<s%>, and your <S%H7379>strife<s%>?

<S%H3051>Take<s%> you <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H995>understanding<s%>, and <S%H3045>known<s%> among your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them <S%H7218>rulers<s%> over you. Take: Heb. Give
And ye <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1697>thing<s%> which thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for us to <S%H6213>do<s%>.

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H3045>known<s%>, and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> over you, <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H2572>fifties<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H6235>tens<s%>, and <S%H7860>officers<s%> among your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>. made: Heb. gave

And I <S%H6680>charged<s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the causes between your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%> between every <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is with him.

Ye shall not <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; but ye shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6996>small<s%> as well as the <S%H1419>great<s%>; ye shall not be <S%H1481>afraid<s%> of the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%>; for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H430>God's<s%>: and the <S%H1697>cause<s%> that is too <S%H7185>hard<s%> for you, <S%H7126>bring<s%> it unto me, and I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> it. respect: Heb. acknowledge faces
And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time<s%> all the <S%H1697>things<s%> which ye should <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And when we <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, we went <S%H3212>through<s%> all that <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, which ye <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us; and we <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea<s%>.
And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto you, Ye are <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> doth <S%H5414>give<s%> unto us.

<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto thee; <S%H3372>fear<s%> not, neither be <S%H2865>discouraged<s%>.

And ye came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto me every one of you, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, and they shall search us <S%H2658>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7725>bring<s%> us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> by what <S%H1870>way<s%> we must go <S%H5927>up<s%>, and into what <S%H5892>cities<s%> we shall <S%H935>come<s%>.

And the <S%H1697>saying<s%> pleased me <S%H3190>well<s%> <S%H5869><s%>: and I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of you, <S%H259>one<s%> of a <S%H376>tribe<s%> <S%H7626><s%>:
And they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and searched it <S%H7270>out<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and brought it <S%H3381>down<s%> unto us, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> doth <S%H5414>give<s%> us.
Notwithstanding ye <S%H14>would<s%> not go <S%H5927>up<s%>, but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>:

And ye <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in your <S%H168>tents<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8135>hated<s%> us, he hath brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> us.

Whither shall we go <S%H5927>up<s%>? our <S%H251>brethren<s%> have <S%H4549>discouraged<s%> our <S%H3824>heart<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H7311>taller<s%> than we; the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1419>great<s%> and walled <S%H1219>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and moreover we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> there. discouraged: Heb. melted
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> unto you, <S%H6206>Dread<s%> not, neither be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, he shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you, according to all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>;

And in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, where thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> how that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>bare<s%> thee, as a <S%H376>man<s%> doth <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> that ye <S%H1980>went<s%>, until ye <S%H935>came<s%> into this <S%H4725>place<s%>.
Yet in this <S%H1697>thing<s%> ye did not <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>,

Who <S%H1980>went<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, to search you <S%H8446>out<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> to pitch your <S%H2583>tents<s%> in, in <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, to <S%H7200>shew<s%> you by what <S%H1870>way<s%> ye should <S%H3212>go<s%>, and in a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words<s%>, and was <S%H7107>wroth<s%>, and <S%H7650>sware<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Surely there shall not <S%H376>one<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> of this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>,

<S%H2108>Save<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>; he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and to him will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath trodden <S%H1869>upon<s%>, and to his <S%H1121>children<s%>, because he hath <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. wholly: Heb. fulfilled to go after
Also the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1558>sakes<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou also shalt not <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H8033>thither<s%>.

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, which <S%H5975>standeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, he shall go <S%H935>in<s%> thither: <S%H2388>encourage<s%> him: for he shall cause <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it.

Moreover your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, which ye <S%H559>said<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey<s%>, and your <S%H1121>children<s%>, which in that <S%H3117>day<s%> had no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> between <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>, they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> thither, and unto them will I <S%H5414>give<s%> it, and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
But as for you, <S%H6437>turn<s%> you, and take your <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

Then ye <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, we will go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%>, according to all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us. And when ye had <S%H2296>girded<s%> on every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, ye were <S%H1951>ready<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto them, Go not <S%H5927>up<s%>, neither <S%H3898>fight<s%>; for I am not <S%H7130>among<s%> you; lest ye be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

So I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto you; and ye would not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%>. went: Heb. ye were presumptuous, and went up

And the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in that <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> you, and <S%H7291>chased<s%> you, as <S%H1682>bees<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H3807>destroyed<s%> you in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, even unto <S%H2767>Hormah<s%>.

And ye <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> would not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice<s%>, nor give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto you.
So ye <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, according unto the <S%H3117>days<s%> that ye <S%H3427>abode<s%> there.
